description_expanded: Equate Ultra Soft Foam Ear Plugs (12 Pairs) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for personal care. Soft foam ear plugs with a 32dB Noise Reduction Rating (NRR). Ideal for sleeping, studying, travel, or loud work environments. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
